name: Wildwood Divas
description: Players will use keyboard arrow keys or WASD to control a highly maneuverable aircraft flying over a threatening battlefield. Around will constantly appear a variety of ferocious monsters, they have a strong attack and defense, the player's aircraft pose a great threat. Players need to control the plane to avoid the attack and collision of monsters. Defeating a certain number of monsters will lead to a successful level, which can earn talent points or unlock a beautiful picture. The talent points gained can be selected to increase the attack power of the aircraft or the attack frequency of the aircraft.
